rex_slgboard.name: Board
rex_slgboard.description: Store the logical position of chess

width.name: Width
width.desc: Initial number of elements on the X axis.

height.name: Height
height.desc: Initial number of elements on the Y axis.

for-each-cell.description: Repeat the event for each cell in the board.

on-collided.description: Triggered when the object collides with another object.

is-overlapping.description: Test if the object is overlapping another object.

is-point-in-board.description: Testing if point is in board.

are-neighbors.description: Testing if two chess are neighbors.

pick-all-chess.display-text: Pick all chess on the board
pick-all-chess.description: Pick all chess on the board.

on-chess-kicked.description: Triggered when chess kicked by 'action:Add chess' or 'action:Move chess'.

logic_x1.name: Logic X
logic_x1.desc: The X index (0-based) of the tile.

logic_y2.name: Logic Y
logic_y2.desc: The Y index (0-based) of the tile.

tile_uid1.name: Tile UID
tile_uid1.desc: Tile UID. Can be tile UID/symbol or a tile UID list in JSON string.

is-chess-on-board.description: Return true if the chess is on the board.

logic_x1.name: Logic X
logic_x1.desc: The X index (0-based) of the tile.

logic_y2.name: Logic Y

logic_z3.name: Logic Z
logic_z3.desc: The Z index (0-based) of the tile.

pick-neighbor-chess.display-text: Pick neighbor chess {2} by origin to {0} , direction to [i]{1}[/i]

direction1.name: Direction
direction1.desc: Direction of neighbor. (-1) for all directions

pick-empty-cell.display-text: Pick an empty cell with logic Z to [i]{0}[/i]
pick-empty-cell.description: Pick an empty cell randomly, return false if all cells are occupied.

logic_z0.name: Logic Z
logic_z0.desc: The Z index (0-based) of the chess to set. 0 is tile.

has-empty-cell.display-text: Has any empty cell with logic Z to [i]{0}[/i]
has-empty-cell.description: Return true if there has any empty cell.

logic_z0.name: Logic Z
logic_z0.desc: The Z index (0-based) of the chess to set. 0 is tile.

are-wrapped-neighbors.description: Testing if two chess are wrapped neighbors.

logic_z1.name: Logic Z
logic_z1.desc: The Z index (0-based) of the chess. 0 is tile.

has-empty-cell-on-tiles.list-name: Has any empty cell on tiles

has-empty-cell-on-tiles.description: Return true if there has any empty cell on tiles.

logic_z1.name: Logic Z
logic_z1.desc: The Z index (0-based) of the chess. 0 is tile.

uid-to-lx.description: Get X index of chess by UID. Return (-1) if the chess is not on the board.

uid-to-ly.description: Get Y index of chess by UID. Return (-1) if the chess is not on the board.

uid-to-lz.description: Get Z index of chess by UID. Return (-1) if the chess is not on the board.

lxyz-to-uid.description: Get UID by XYZ index. Return (-1) if this position has no chess.

lz-to-uid.description: Get UID by relative UID and Z. Return (-1) if this position has no chess.

lxy-to-px.description: Get physical X co-ordinate by logic X,Y index. Return (-1) if this position does not exist.

lxy-to-py.description: Get physical Y co-ordinate by logic X,Y index. Return (-1) if this position does not exist.

uid-to-px.description: Get X co-ordinate by UID. Return (-1) if the chess is not on the board.

uid-to-py.description: Get Y co-ordinate by UID. Return (-1) if the chess is not on the board.

uid-to-la.description: Get Logic angle by UID, in degree. (-1) is invalid angle.

origin0.name: Origin
origin0.desc: The UID of chess at origin.

faceto1.name: FaceTo
faceto1.desc: The UID of chess to face.

lxyz-to-px.description: Get physical X co-ordinate by logic X,Y,Z index.

lxyz-to-py.description: Get physical Y co-ordinate by logic X,Y,Z index.

uid-to-lz-cnt.description: Get z count at select chess by UID. Return 0 if the chess is not on the board.

lxy-to-lz-cnt.description: Get z count at logic X,Y index. Return 0 if this position does not exist.

pxy-to-lx.description: Get logic X by physical X,Y co-ordinate.

pxy-to-ly.description: Get logic Y by physical X,Y co-ordinate.

dir-to-uid.description: Get neighbor UID by UID and direction. Add 3rd parameter to indicate z-index. Return (-1) if no chess picked.

pxy-to-nearest-px.description: Get nearest X co-ordinate of cell from physical position.

pxy-to-nearest-py.description: Get nearest Y co-ordinate of cell from physical position.

logic-distance.description: Get logic distance of two chess. Return (-1) if one of chess is not on the board.

empty-lx.description: Get X co-ordinate of an empty cell under "Condition:Pick an empty cell". or "Condition:Has any empty cell".

empty-ly.description: Get Y co-ordinate of an empty cell under "Condition:Pick an empty cell". or "Condition:Has any empty cell".

neigboruid-to-dir.description: Get logic direction of two neighbor chess from chess A to chessB. Return (-1) if they are not on the board.

all-directions.description: Direction code for all directions (-1), used in "Condition: Pick neighbor chess".

pxy-to-uid.description: Get UID by physical X,Y co-ordinate. Add 3rd parameter to indicate z-index. Return (-1) if no chess picked.

current-lx.description: Get the current logic X index in a For Each loop.

current-ly.description: Get the current logic Y index in a For Each loop.

current-lz.description: Get the current logic Z index in a For Each loop.

max-lx.description: Get maximum of LX of all chess.

max-ly.description: Get maximum of LY of all chess.

min-lx.description: Get minimum of LX of all chess.

min-ly.description: Get minimum of LY of all chess.
